top_stories.title: RAGdb: A Zero-Dependency, Embeddable Architecture for Multimodal Retrieval-Augmented Generation on the Edge
top_stories.summary: arXiv:2602.22217v1 Announce Type: cross Abstract: Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) has established itself as the standard paradigm for grounding Large Language Models (LLMs) in domain-specific, up-to-date data. However, the prevailing architecture for RAG has evolved into a complex, distributed stack requiring cloud-hosted vector databases, hea
top_stories.technical_takeaway: Hybrid local-cloud inference is becoming the dominant deployment model.

top_stories.title: Meta signs multi-billion dollar deal to rent Google's TPUs in a direct challenge to Nvidia's AI chip dominance
top_stories.summary: Meta is renting Google's AI chips to train its models, a deal worth billions that puts Nvidia's dominance on notice. The article Meta signs multi-billion dollar deal to rent Google's TPUs in a direct challenge to Nvidia's AI chip dominance appeared first on The Decoder.
top_stories.technical_takeaway: Adds empirical validation to approaches already used in production AI stacks.
top_stories.primary_risk: Risk of overfitting conclusions to narrow benchmarks.
top_stories.primary_opportunity: Selective adoption in niche use cases with clear ROI.

top_stories.title: Figma and OpenAI connect design and code through new Codex integration
top_stories.summary: A new integration links Figma's design platform directly with OpenAI's Codex. The article Figma and OpenAI connect design and code through new Codex integration appeared first on The Decoder.
top_stories.technical_takeaway: Reinforces known techniques with modest refinements to existing methods.
top_stories.primary_risk: Unclear production readiness despite promising early results.
top_stories.primary_opportunity: Practical improvements when layered onto existing AI workflows.

top_stories.title: OpenAI Fires an Employee for Prediction Market Insider Trading
top_stories.summary: Prediction markets like Polymarket and Kalshi are big business, and some Big Tech employees are testing boundaries by making trades based on insider knowledge.
